Strings.Text: There is nothing in the enclosure.{pause}
It's an over-sized shutter for the \ntransportation of materials. It's {pause}{clear}not operational due to the \nrusted condition.{pause}
There is a diving suit inside. You \nneed to resume power to take {pause}{clear}out the suit.{pause}
It's a terminal which stores the \nlogs of the diving suit usage.{pause}{clear}There is no power.{pause}
This terminal controls the power \nto this room. There is no need {pause}{clear}to operate it anymore.{pause}
It's a terminal which stores the \nlogs of the diving suit usage.{pause}{clear}It has been more than a year \nsince the diving suits were last {pause}{clear}used.{pause}

This terminal controls the power 
to all the machines in this room. {pause}{clear}The power has been shut to the 
elevator and to the diving suit {pause}{clear}enclosure. Displayed on the 
screen is the program to restart {pause}{clear}the power.{pause}{clear}Will you restart the power?{0x3000}
You have failed to restart the \nmain power.{pause}{clear}Will you try again?{0x3000}
Regina wore the diving suit to go \ndown to the underwater facility.{pause}
This is the control panel which \noperates the over-sized {pause}{clear}elevator.{pause}{clear}You need to wear the diving suit \nin order to go down underwater.{pause}
Dylan is not able to wear the \ndiving suit. Nor can he operate {pause}{clear}the control panel either.{pause}
This is the control panel which \noperates the over-sized {pause}{clear}elevator.{pause}{clear}You need to resume power to \noperate it.{pause}
